comments.author: Terry
comments.body: dave you're an inspiration to us all... to think, 78 years old and still riding flagstaff; impressive my good man. ;-) (something tells me after dave retires we'll be doing this celebration again for mr. steve bailey's 600th ascent). terry

comments.author: Steve
comments.body: will it count if i've been secretly using a silent motor?

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: The only thing better than doing Flagstaff 600 times is doing it with great friends! Thanks everyone! And thanks Kristen, for the cooler-load. What a great sight. (A little different day than that one last winter when we ran the ski-jump trail at 2 below, eh?) Thanks again, D
